text: The Dominican Republic competed at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. ==Results by event== ===Athletics=== Men's 800 metres * Francisco Solis ** Heat -- 1:55.56 (→ did not advance) ===Boxing=== Men's Light Flyweight (- 48 kg) * Eleoncio Mercedes *# First Round -- Lost to Aleksandr Tkachenko (URS), RSC-1 ==References== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1976 Summer Olympics 1976 Category:1976 in the Dominican Republic
title: Dominican Republic at the 1976 Summer Olympics
